urn:li:activity:7337438553238302720.message: The scale of compute growth you highlighted is staggering. In my work, scaling infrastructure often unlocks new model capabilities we hadn't anticipated. Staying ahead of this curve will require collaboration across regions to balance innovation with equitable access.

urn:li:activity:7337491132475445248.message: Your analysis highlights how ambiguous test prompts can mislead LLMs. In my work, unclear requirements often lead to misaligned outcomes. Clear specifications are critical for accurate results. This underscores the need for rigorous testing frameworks in AI development.
